column4: I am trying to install something from the universe repo.  I'm pretty sure i have it in sources.list ( deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ edgy universe
deb-src http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ edgy universe) but it isn't recognised.  Any ideas?
what are you trying to install?
do you want source or a binary package?
then you can download from packages.ubuntulinux.org it seems
you'll need all three to build a deb - read the apt-howto for more info
the package is called python-serial apparently
in these situations it's best to do a search like apt-cache search python serial
it's a pain as under sapper i simply did apt-get install
apparently pyserial is the *source* package and python-serial is the binary
